text: Xushui railway station () is a station on Beijing–Guangzhou railway and Tianjin–Baoding intercity railway in Xushui District, Baoding, Hebei. == History == The station was opened in 1899. The station was expanded in 2014 due to the construction of the Tianjin-Baoding intercity railway. The expansion was finished in 2015 and passenger services resumed on 10 January 2016. == References == Category:Railway stations in Hebei Category:Stations on the Beijing–Guangzhou Railway Category:Stations on the Tianjin–Baoding Intercity Railway
title: Xushui railway station
